index-what-is-rtt-text: Rapid Transformational Therapy™ (RTT™) is a novel, neuroscience-based therapy that uses a combination of hypnotherapy, psychotherapy and cognitive behavioural therapy to achieve rapid, effective results. RTT™ delivers exceptional, lasting results and can be used for a variety of problems
